thread.title: Chagrin Falls School District hires Boys Soccer Coach: Community voices
thread.title_full: Chagrin Falls School District hires Boys Soccer Coach: Community voices

author: Charlene Paparizos, Chagrin Falls Schools
title: Chagrin Falls School District hires Boys Soccer Coach: Community voices
text: On February 21, the Chagrin Falls Board of Education approved the hiring of Brian McKenna as the new Chagrin Falls Boys Soccer Coach.  McKenna has been the Junior Varsity Girls Soccer Coach at Chagrin Falls for 17 years. Previously, he...
